ingredients.item: 280g pack Waitrose Boneless Scottish Salmon Fillets, skinned

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200°C, gas mark 6. Halve the fennel bulb, remove the core and slice. Place in a roasting tin with the pepper, garlic and tomatoes. Add the oil and half the basil, and toss to coat evenly. Season, then roast for 20 minutes.

Meanwhile, cut each salmon fillet in half to give 4 long strips of salmon. Toss with the pesto and thread onto 4 skewers. Place on a grill pan under a preheated grill for 3-4 minutes each side until cooked through.
Sprinkle the roasted fennel, pepper and tomatoes with the remaining basil, and serve with the salmon.
